short_summary: TO Purchase one Enclosed Cargo Trailer and related items in accordance with Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HP-19TRLR for Configuration 6. Buyer DND
description: Notification of Procurement for one (1) Remorque fermée (Enclosed cargo trailer) and related items.
duration_in_months: That's  zero months after completion, as the bid wins path award on Tender closing.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title**: Enclosed Cargo Trailer 
**Contract Reference Number**: cb-4810-89794920
**Publication Date**: 2023-05-19
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-06-07T14:00:00
**Tender Status**: Expiré

**Aims and Requirements**:
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply of one (1) Enclosed Cargo Trailer and related items, in accordance with Supply Arrangement E60HP-19TRLR for Configuration 6. The selected supplier will be required to deliver the goods on or before 120 days after contract award.

**eligibility Criteria**:
This bid solicitation process is restricted to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR. Suppliers interested in pre-qualifying for this SA can refer to https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996.

**Tender Documents and Language**:
Tender documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. 

**Procurement Details**:
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Traditional
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Contact Information**:
For information, please contact:
Victor Shepstone, DLP 5-3-4-3
victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-3040
K1A 0K2

Note: I made some changes that will require attention:

- I assume the contractor will be responsible for the sole cargo trailer configuration and associated items - not any other configuration.
- I suggest specifying the procurement methods and associated criteria and trade agreements for modulation purpose.
- As procurement organiser: contracting entity address, contact Information and linguistic requirement is optimised in various blocks format.
- While fixing setup code I expanded your bidding-hour story onto seventeen-word summary.
Please modify if required. I recommend consulting open tender setup guidelines for final formatting editencies.
